name: CancelLeaseRequest
title: Google
Cloud
Tasks
V2beta2
CancelLeaseRequest
description: Request message for canceling a lease using Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::CloudTasks::CancelLease.

returns.description:
Required.

The task’s current schedule time, available in the Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::Task#schedule_time returned by Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::CloudTasks::LeaseTasks response or Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::CloudTasks::RenewLease response. This restriction is to ensure that your worker currently holds the lease.

Required.

The task’s current schedule time, available in the Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::Task#schedule_time returned by Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::CloudTasks::LeaseTasks response or Google::Cloud::Tasks::V2beta2::CloudTasks::RenewLease response. This restriction is to ensure that your worker currently holds the lease.

The response_view specifies which subset of the Task will be returned.

By default response_view is BASIC; not all information is retrieved by default because some data, such as payloads, might be desirable to return only when needed because of its large size or because of the sensitivity of data that it contains.

Authorization for FULL requires +cloudtasks.tasks.fullView+ Google IAM permission on the Task resource.

The response_view specifies which subset of the Task will be returned.

By default response_view is BASIC; not all information is retrieved by default because some data, such as payloads, might be desirable to return only when needed because of its large size or because of the sensitivity of data that it contains.

Authorization for FULL requires +cloudtasks.tasks.fullView+ Google IAM permission on the Task resource.
